body: The earth welcomes you, showing you the secret paths through sand and soil.
name: Oread Earth Glider
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Oreads/New Racial Rules/Oread Feats/Oread Earth Glider

sections.body: Oread Burrower, Stony Step, character level 13th, oread.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You gain the earth glide universal monster ability and can use it to travel at your full base speed through sand, dirt, clay, gravel, or similar materials. If protected against fire damage, you can even burrow through lava. You can burrow through solid stone at 1/2 your base speed.
sections.name: Benefit
